SC.SYS_CUSTOMER_NAME LIKE concat('%',#sysCustomerName#,'%') SC.SYS_AREA_ID = #sysAreaId# SC.SYS_STATUS_ID = #stateId#
ORDER BY SYS_CUSTOMER_ID limit #pro_mysql#,#page_record#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_CUSTOMER SC

SELECT * FROM SYS_CUSTOMER SC LEFT JOIN SYS_AREA SA ON SC.SYS_AREA_ID=SA.SYS_AREA_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_STATUS SS ON SC.SYS_STATUS_ID=SS.SYS_STATUS_ID WHERE SC.SYS_STATUS_ID=1
